title: HP is reportedly working on a 17-inch foldable laptop, possibly coming this year
content:
HP is preparing to launch its first foldable laptop later this year or early next year, according to a new report. The company will be using 17-inch 4K OLED panels manufactured by LG Display, with a transparent polyimide film provided by SK IE Technology. HP isn’t the first to jump on this bandwagon, seeing as

The post HP is reportedly working on a 17-inch foldable laptop, possibly coming this year appeared first on xda-developers.
description: HP is reportedly preparing to launch a 17-inch foldable laptop, which culd be coming later this year. It will use an LG OLED panel.
